# RSA-encryption-decryption-

Step 1: Generating a 1024- bit private/public key pair based on RSA <br/>
Step 2: Encrypt the plaintext, and send it to the destination using the public key <br/>
Step 3: Send the data, and with the private and public key decrypt the ciphertext <br/>
